---
title: Farmington at Tariffville Data
output: html_document
---

<div class="col2">
 
```{r, fig.width=4, fig.height=4.3,echo=FALSE,out.extra='style="float:right"'}
dygraph(farm_cdom1,group="farm",ylab="CDOM (QSU)",width=450,height=300)  %>% 
    dyRangeSelector()  %>% 
	 dyOptions(drawGrid = FALSE,rightGap=25) %>% 
  dyCrosshair(direction = "vertical")
```
 
```{r, fig.width=4, fig.height=4.3,echo=FALSE,out.extra='style="float:right"'}
dygraph(farm_turb,group="farm",ylab="Turbidity (NTU)",width=450,height=300)  %>% 
    dyRangeSelector()  %>% 
	 dyOptions(drawGrid = FALSE) %>% 
  dyCrosshair(direction = "vertical")
```
</div>
